attributes.action: introduce legislation to immediately remove all rights of patronage conferred upon sitting and outgoing Prime Ministers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown, by stating that he intends to appoint 20 new peers before the next general election 'partly to block new Tory laws should he lose the election' demonstrates that he nor any other prime minister can be trusted to operate in any other fashion than in the prime interests of himself and his party.  This abomination has to be stopped NOW!

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
